title: No NEL service between Serangoon and Sengkang due to power fault

updates.text: NEL service has resumed. Bridging buses & free bus rides at designated bus stops has ceased. Once again, we are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
NEL SVC has resumed. Free regular and bridging buses at affected stations to continue till further notice. Once again, we are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
Update: Train svc is available btw HarbourFront & Serangoon. Free bus rides are available btw Serangoon & Punggol. Recovery work is still in progress. We are sorry.
Update: Train svc is available btwn HarbourFront & Serangoon. Free bus rides are available btwn Serangoon & Punggol. Recovery work is still in progress. We are sorry.
Update: Train svc is available btwn HarbourFront & Serangoon. Free bus rides are available btwn Serangoon & Punggol. Recovery work is in progress. We are sorry.
Update: Train svc is available btwn HarbourFront & Serangoon. Free bus rides are available btwn Serangoon & Punggol.
Train svc is available btwn HarbourFront & Serangoon and bwtn Sengkang & Punggol. Free bus rides are available btwn Serangoon & Punggol. We are sorry.
No NEL svc between Serangoon NE12 & Sengkang NE16 due to power fault. Free bus rides are available at affected stns. We are sorry.
